article.title: Harris Joins IRS Contract For Tactical Multiband Radios
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Harris Corporation has been selected as one of seven contractors to supply the Department of Justice with Project 25 (P25) radios under an Indefinite Delivery, Indefinite Quantity (IDIQ) contract with a potential value of $750 million. Under the five-year contract, Harris joins a group of companies whose products meet established P25 criteria.
